about_the_game:
Gold Patron

Support Starcade Arcade by painting your orbit robot in this exclusive skin! Are you a fan of supporting a struggling indie VR studio? Do you have enough money that you can justify spending silly amounts on digital skins? Better question - do you want to see the creators of this game continue to update it and make new games? If so, then support us by buying this special golden skin!

Exclusive Multiplayer Skin

Wear the skin throughout any StarRaver club or concert, visible to any person you meet with in your night of adventures. Change to this skin by choosing it from the wall in the Elevator Hub room.

name: StarRaver - Gold Patron Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

Do you have enough money that you can justify spending silly amounts on digital skins? If so, then support us by buying this special golden skin!
